events.message: I recently received my order but unfortunately I want to return it and get a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request following their message about returning the product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help with your refund request and get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can start processing your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product was not as described on your website, so I want to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and sent you an email with the return shipping label. Please send the item back within 7 days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. Iâ€™ve received the label and will send the product back shortly.
We have confirmed receipt of your returned item and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing the case. Thank you for reaching out!
